src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Pali Cimo, ba Sara Danius, ba kalemba mukalamba aba kabungwe ka Nobel Committee for Literature pa Swedish Academy, babilishe linkpalwalala ilyo kwali pulogilamu ya pa cilimba pa mulabasa wa Sveriges Radio mu Sweden ukutila akabungwe, panuma ya kufilwa ukufika kuli Bob Dylan pa mulandu wakucimfya icikombe ca 2016 Nobel Prize mufya Kulemba, kalilabileko ku kwesha kwa kufika kuli wena.
hyp_text: Mu Mwanafulu, Sara Danius, sekreteli ya kufwila ya Komiti ya Nobel pa Luswanga pa Akademi ya Swedi, yakwata mwanafulu kufula pa program ya radio pa Sveriges Radio pa Swedi, komiti, yakalamba kufwila Bob Dylan pa kufwila 2016 Nobel Prize pa Luswanga, yakalamba kufwila ukufwila ukwata.

src_text: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
ref_text: Ilyo balebomba ngaba NSA, balyafwilisheko ba Carter mu kubombela bwino pa milandu iikumine isonde lyonse, pamo nga Camp David Accords, mu 1978; ukuwamya ubwampano bwa US–China mu kupwa kwa myaka yamuma 1970; Ukwimina kwa Buteko bwa Iran, ukwalengele kube ukwikata kwaba nkole mu Iran, mu 1979; elyo no kusansa kwa calo ca Afghanistan kubena Soviet, mu 1979.
hyp_text: Ku NSA, ukufuma ukulya Carter ku lukalya makanda a Bung'anda, makanda afula, ifya ku Camp David Accords, 1978; ukulya US-China makanda afula pa mufumu wa 1970s; Revolushoni ya Iran, ifya iyalipila kuli krisi ya mukulya Iran, 1979; na ukulya kufwanya Soviet pa Afghanistan, 1979.

src_text: In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations.
ref_text: Mu mwaka wa 1624 akampani ka Dutch East India kalipangilepo incende ya kwikalapo lwa ku masamba ya Taiwan, ukutendeka ukwalula kwa mipangile yakale iya nseke no kwingisha ababomfi ba ku China incito sha kubomba mu mabala ya mupunga ne fisali.
hyp_text: Mwana wa 1624, Compani ya Nkongwa ya Nkongo ya Hesi ya Dushi eyasankalila kufwila mu chitwa cha Taiwan cha pafwa, ikalamba ukutontela kwa abantu ba mukolo bakwata bakwata bakwata, na kupeleka abantu ba Chini ba kufwila ku kabwata kwa rice na sugar.

hyp_text: Pa ntima yabakalafye pa Kukweka pa Lusuba-Lukalamba na Chitulu cha Mpasase pa 4 ya Lusuba, mukwandi kuli ilitundu likwata lisoswa pa mukwandi kwa Rikwandi pa Kukweka John Hancock na Rikwandi pa Charles Thomson, pa ntima yabakalafye pa mukwandi ku kufwila kwa nshita ya John Dunlap.

src_text: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa.
ref_text: Umusumba walelo uwa Casablanca wasangilwe na balondo besabi abaku Berber mu mwanda wa myaka uwalenga 10 BCE. elyo kabili walebomfiwa nabena Phoenicia, abena Roma, elyo nabena Mernids nge cishi icaleitwa Anfa.

src_text: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find.
ref_text: Ifikuulwa fyakuteyelamo injuka (Casinos) filalwisha nganshi ukubomfya inshita ne ndalama bwino ishiposwa nabeni. Ama windo ne nkoloko ilingi tafisangwamo, elyo no kwakufumina kwalyafwa ukumoneka.

src_text: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation.
ref_text: Mu nshita ya Nkondo ya Kulubulwa kwa bena America ukufuma ku Britain, imisumba ikumi na itatu eyabalilepo ukupanga ubuteeko ubwanaka—ubwa kwete Ing’anda ya Mafunde (Congress) nge cilundwa fye cimo—mwisamba lya fyalembwa ifya Articles of Confederation.
hyp_text: Mu mufumu wakwiba, aabatatu abalanda ba pafwa bafwile bwino bwakufwa kuli gubwa lisansa lya sentrali, na kufwile Congress kuli muntu wakufwa kuli, pafwa kuli makwandi a Articles of Confederation.
